segments.text: Well , I've got a date . Now I need to find a restaurant . Can you help me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem , of course ! How much would you like to spend to impress the lady ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Nothing but the best for a pretty woman !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sir , the restaurant you seek is right here . This hotel has a three-star restaurant .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I sort of suggested that we would go out on the town . Do you have another suggestion ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Gramercy Tavern is at least as good as our own hotel restaurant . Plus , they have live jazz .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Gramercy Tavern , eh ? I think I've heard of that before . Call to get us a table , okay ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right away , sir . She will be impressed with your local knowledge .
segments.speaker: S2
